title: Codesign of Hardware and Software
description: Advanced projects in the codesign of software/hardware for a wireless embedded system. Students will design and simulate both hardware and software of a wireless embedded system, with special attention to the hardware/software interfaces. Specific case studies will include the design of a media access control layer in hardware/software. Advanced topics will include the cooptimization and covalidation of software and hardware for a general wireless embedded system.
